entry.title: NIST 8202 Blockchain Technology Overview
entry.summary: The context is a correction to an email that was previously sent with an incorrect date. The original email was titled "NIST 8202 Blockchain Technology Overview" and had the wrong date of Jan 20th in the header. The corrected date is Jan 28th, which can be verified by checking the signature of the email. The sender also sent an email with the corrected date to the NIST comments email address.The message is signed with PGP and includes a SHA512 hash. The signature includes a timestamp when signing, which can be used to verify the correct date of the email. The sender's name or identity is not mentioned in the context.Overall, this is a brief message indicating a correction to an email that was previously sent out with an incorrect date. The corrected date is provided and can be verified through the signature of the email.
